edge: Scarlett Johansson portrays Olivia Wenscombe in the movie.
Christopher Nolan was 'very keen' for Scarlett Johansson to play the role of Olivia Wenscombe in the movie.
Scarlett Johansson's character, Olivia Wenscombe, is an assistant to Angier.
Piper Perabo portrays Julia McCullough in the movie.

Rebecca Hall portrays Sarah Borden in the movie.
Sarah Borden is a wife of Borden.
Christopher Nolan wanted David Bowie to play the role of Nikola Tesla because he was 'extraordinarily charismatic' and no one else could possibly play the part.
